string.text: {=!}Yes? Do I know you? (Default - should not appear)
{=!}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while. (Default - should not appear)
{=B05S6Fw4}Who are you, and what do you want?
{=IU3KjVbT}That's close enough. Who are you?
{=pbQjBNT3}{STR_SALUTATION}... May I introduce myself...
{=a67lBQad}Who are you? Answer quickly, before I give the order to attack.
{=q3WvWFD1}{STR_SALUTATION}. It's been a while.
{=y41EYSBI}{STR_SALUTATION}. It's good to see you.
{=KnJoVOEk}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your command.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=nOMhLR63}{STR_SALUTATION}... You are lovely as ever.
{=qSVbfakb}{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a delight to see you.
{=lvScVM9T}Please be brief. I am pressed for time.
{=A3eeOUZH}You know what I think of you. This better be important.
{=YubrUiab}{STR_SALUTATION}... You still live, I see. Pity.
{=SCGyic5H}{STR_SALUTATION}... Try my patience, and you'll regret it.
{=8kCCsahd}{STR_SALUTATION}... I know your tricks, and you know mine. So, fight or parley, let's just get to it...
{=xtCrabo9}Don't know you. Want to tell me your name, before we fight?
{=U2Kr8vTy}I've caught you. Don't try any tricks. Anything to say?
{=dHxX40H0}Well. So I guess you and me are fighting. That's how fate goes. Anything to say?
{=d6LHL0Fj}Looks like you're caught, and I'm glad I'm the one who caught you.
{=zfWpSLfd}Well... And who do we have here? Would you care to tell me your good name?
{=imbZKZIZ}{STR_SALUTATION}... It is my great honor to introduce myself to you.
{=p1CHHIFb}Forgive me for what may seem an abundance of caution, but please keep your distance. Just beyond sword-length is fine. So, who might you be?
{=CdHlFmue}Tell me your name. Forgive me if I have met you before and do not remember the occasion, for I have seen many warriors come to this land and pass swiftly into shallow graves.
{=tJVlv0TN}Since you're not going anywhere, we might as well have a little chat. Perhaps you'd like to introduce yourself?
{=03Q47XnC}Well now. I always like to know a bit about people before I kill them. Do you care to tell me your good name?
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=F1KEe2XG}Please be brief. I am pressed for time.
{=AoBIFXZH}{STR_SALUTATION}... Well, well. I am most curious to hear whatever it is you have to say.
{=lK32NXY8}I trust you have been keeping well, doing honor to your name and cutting bloody swathes through your enemies.
{=TmQpdK7M}{STR_SALUTATION}... Your beauty is a balm to my troubles.
{=KJsVOyUE}{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a delight to see you.
{=j6p0K0s6}{STR_SALUTATION}. I'm yours to command.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=UW9Pexaq}{STR_SALUTATION}. I'm yours to command. Allow me to write your will in the pages of history in letters of blood. Or whatever else you may need...
{=uLkQmlad}{STR_SALUTATION}... Fate clearly loves to watch old friends fight... Still, don't think I won't do my duty.
{=5C1seeEM}Halt! Do you have anything to say, before I give the order to attack?
{=wIXmtKa5}What a pleasant surprise! I believe I'm going to enjoy this. Do you have anything to say, before I give the order to attack?
{=k8gI5Ix3}Your pardon - I did not catch your name.
{=AYeRBAxA}Now then. Come no closer. Forgive me, but one cannot be too cautious. I would ask you for your name.
{=1VBiVUBz}{STR_SALUTATION}... Allow me to introduce myself.
{=h6g4OQqT}Halt right there. Now then... Tell me your name, before we cross swords.
{=l0Bmbgqg}Come no closer. Before we come to blows, I would ask you your name.
{=SdXCOffd}Respect the terms of the parley, and I will do likewise. Now, who are you?
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=F1KEe2XG}Please be brief. I am pressed for time.
{=xAaxpdb3}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's very, very good to see you.
{=ZRUCzgxQ}{STR_SALUTATION}... Unless you have something worthwhile to say, go pour your poison into someone else's ear.
{=3bW5jWJ1}{STR_SALUTATION}... However much one may show oneself unworthy of trust, one should always have another chance to make amends. In this spirit, I shall listen to whatever you have to say.
{=XmwqrCLY}{STR_SALUTATION}... You know, puffed-up bandits such as yourself always get what they deserve, in the end.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=5RpfV389}{STR_SALUTATION}... My sword is yours to command.
{=nESnaBbx}My lady... You are lovely as ever.
{=2V0eF42T}{STR_SALUTATION}... So good to see you. It's been too long.
{=PihQGbui}{STR_SALUTATION}... I take no joy in fighting you, but believe me I will do it if I need to.
{=laroTh3e}Do you have anything to say, before I give the order to attack?
{=n5Va4JVo}Ah, good. Justice seems to have appointed me her executioner today. Are you partial to the sword, or the noose?
{=nzSUfX5b}Prepare to reap a villain's reward, villain!
{=vvkBHcAL}I don't know you. I suppose you should tell me your name.
{=axO6JCWt}If you please... Stop there. I would ask you for your name.
{=1VBiVUBz}{STR_SALUTATION}... Allow me to introduce myself.
{=pf3LDFVp}Leave your sword in its scabbard for a moment longer, stranger. Who might you be?
{=l03Kxell}Halt... Before we fight, I would know your name.
{=Ny7o14yZ}Tell me your name. I always prefer to know whom I slay.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=aCFQOGye}{STR_SALUTATION}... I await your orders.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=PiaaXapn}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's very good to see you.
{=nOMhLR63}{STR_SALUTATION}... You are lovely as ever.
{=KJsVOyUE}{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a delight to see you.
{=jljaKTRo}{STR_SALUTATION}... I am a bit pressed for time right now. What is it?
{=wzhYA3XN}{STR_SALUTATION}... I don't know what we have to say to each other.
{=g9Gav4yj}{STR_SALUTATION}... So... A serpent has come to hiss in my ear.
{=G0qCtfK2}{STR_SALUTATION}... Such a pity we meet like this.
{=cXQm4Wba}Halt... If you respect the terms of the parley, I will listen.
{=YJvvaeDq}{STR_SALUTATION}... You'd best pray to the Heavens for mercy, because I intend to show none to you.
{=ay0tHozl}Aye? So who're you, then?
{=RNfnK0Vv}Em.... Greetings, my lady. I do not believe that we've met.
{=mkFfE4Pm}That's close enough, now. Who are you?
{=2Uuwrvmw}{STR_SALUTATION}... Let me introduce myself.
{=97bAooa5}God.. Wine here tastes like piss. Right... So who're you?
{=aZeMzNXf}Yeah? You want something from me? Who're you?
{=Kp0Mc35d}Halt. Who're you?
{=7dqD89gR}Stop there. You can tell me who you are, or save your breath for what comes next.
{=q3WvWFD1}{STR_SALUTATION}. It's been a while.
{=y41EYSBI}{STR_SALUTATION}. It's good to see you.
{=KnJoVOEk}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your command.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=GgERkyDL}My lady...
{=NZ9E0KVb}You know I don't care for you. What's it you want to say?
{=7eDCl1nd}{STR_SALUTATION}... I've got you. You're not going anywhere.
{=7eDCl1nd}{STR_SALUTATION}... I've got you. You're not going anywhere.
{=vyeEx182}{STR_SALUTATION}... I don't want to have to fight you. But I will, friend, I will.
{=aOkilS3H}Right. So who might you be, then?
{=z3zTyNru}Come any closer, stranger, and I'll stick a knife in your belly. But if you stay where you are, we may have a pleasant enough chat.
{=hW0ce7Nd}Welcome, stranger, to my little kingdom here. Who might you be?
{=b9DEXqta}Halt there. Right... So we can parley a bit. But try anything tricky, my boys will cut you down.
{=Es1MRkbS}{STR_SALUTATION}... This is truly an honor. Let me introduce myself.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while. Keeping busy, I assume.
{=mru1p8Fz}{STR_SALUTATION}... Awaiting your orders, as always.
{=AFsNtnd8}{STR_SALUTATION}... At your service, as always.
{=bI4IbX25}{STR_SALUTATION}... Well... Been a while since I last laid eyes on you. Can't say I minded much.
{=1BZmK6EP}Well, now... Guess we'll be spilling each other's blood shortly. Anything on your mind, before we set to it?
{=mHjnRrLk}Well, I'll not deny it. It'll be a real pleasure to watch you writhing and bleeding in the dust.
{=WAK8lSaW}Well, good day to you. So who might you be?
{=TCJIGLaL}Your health, stranger! So who might you be?
{=YzBDQ8J3}So... Just so you know, this here is my turf. Now, who might you be?
{=Ia4zfagK}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's an honor to meet you.
{=CcPZbyiv}Stop there, mate. So, you might want to tell me your name, before we cross swords.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=9uQibOo8}I'm at your service, {STR_SALUTATION}.
{=rWuWrr2s}{STR_SALUTATION}... I won't pretend I like you, but I'll hear you out.
{=DXYVZbcz}{STR_SALUTATION}... Ready to give me a good fight?
{=LNhUaIoB}Right, you. Prepare to get what's coming to you.
{=43KLZl7D}{STR_SALUTATION}... If it comes down to a fight between you and me, well... I'll take no joy in it.
{=YGAYp0pO}Aye? Sorry, I don't think I know you.
{=4RbOYBQb}Halt. You want to tell me who you are, or shall we just have at it?
{=gGjqzb5j}What is it, stranger? Who're you?
{=B0YYHX47}Yes? You need something from me? Who are you?
{=2Uuwrvmw}{STR_SALUTATION}... Let me introduce myself.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=KnJoVOEk}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your command.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=GCTtfyGS}I don't know what we have to say to each other.
{=LRpsEe3F}{STR_SALUTATION}... Good to see you.
{=s27yxVHY}Do you have anything to say?
{=PvxtpJaY}Yours is not a face I know. What is your name, stranger?
{=RNfnK0Vv}Em.... Greetings, my lady. I do not believe that we've met.
{=nFPrHMdU}Eh. Wine here tastes like piss. Anyway, what do you want?
{=cOEodlOB}You wanted to see me for something?
{=aGP9qTGp}{STR_SALUTATION}... I offer you my loyalty.
{=8i2Z7jJa}Halt there. So, tell me who I fight?
{=yd0sShGW}Halt there. Who are you? I would know whom I slay.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=LvafEVjz}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm yours to command.
{=4j7uEWlA}{STR_SALUTATION}... I am at your service.
{=oYskGouF}{STR_SALUTATION}... My heart is glad to see you.
{=Z2bRJhTh}{STR_SALUTATION}... If you die well today, I'll be sure your courage is remembered.
{=uhSeQI7D}Say whatever you have to say. After that, you die.
{=CEKlT71P}Well. Here we are. Give me a decent funeral if I fall to your sword, and I'll do the same for you. Do you have anything to say?
{=TjrwrSH9}Peace to you, stranger. What is your name?
{=P3o4r7cB}What do you want, stranger? Who are you?
{=8i2Z7jJa}Halt there. So, tell me who I fight?
{=aGP9qTGp}{STR_SALUTATION}... I offer you my loyalty.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=LvafEVjz}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm yours to command.
{=4j7uEWlA}{STR_SALUTATION}... I am at your service.
{=uVm44ScK}{STR_SALUTATION}... Peace to you.
{=4RMGcBuj}{STR_SALUTATION}... Peace to you... I am glad to see you.
{=iNYLG9P1}I am very angry with you. Too much time has gone by since last you visited.
{=CiquaIVy}It looks like your sins have yet to catch up with you. But they will, believe me they will..
{=gLWgcDUN}Ah, the Heavens are kind. What kind of death do you want, dog?
{=fQRGVkTL}Well, if it comes down to you and me, let's make it a fight that the bards will sing about, hey?
{=oqSF8Ueu}Well now, stranger. Peace to you. What is your name?
{=ZBjXh6cA}Stop there, stranger. I bid you peace. At least until I find out who you are, anyway.
{=wAAdnzKD}Peace to you, stranger, though if you come any closer I may stick a knife in your belly, as one cannot be too careful these days.
{=WACwhm8r}{STR_SALUTATION}! I am honored to meet you. Let me introduce myself.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... My greetings to you.
{=aCFQOGye}{STR_SALUTATION}... I await your orders.
{=9emUaMsx}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm at your service.
{=PCLD3G3s}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'd wish you peace and prosperity, but of course I don't want that.
{=pm786w3d}Such a pleasant surprise to see you. I hope my men can find some fetters of silver or gold, worthy of your rank, as it appears you may be gracing us with your presence tonight.
{=DwqTbXhg}Well... Unless I reckon the odds falsely, I'd say you have a very good chance of feasting with your ancestors before this day is through.
{=xiFrtNGH}Ah... Fate smiles on me today. I can think of no sweeter music than your death-rattle.
{=hbvuSLB0}Well. Here we are. I once thought friendship was sacred, but all sacred things are profaned in the end. Don't think I won't kill you if I need to.
{=mcNlccCF}Aye? I don't think I know you. Peace to you, stranger.
{=Q3kWez4P}Stop there. Who are you? It is better we know each other's names, even if we fight.
{=3WtZ4AKa}I don't know you... If you have anything to say, say it quickly. The ravens are hungry and I would not keep them waiting.
{=pff33rZl}{STR_SALUTATION}. I am at your service.
{=gMyAYyEX}{STR_SALUTATION}... It's been a while.
{=LvafEVjz}{STR_SALUTATION}... I'm yours to command.
{=4j7uEWlA}{STR_SALUTATION}... I am at your service.

{=uGuu5JPx}{STR_SALUTATION}...You'd best pray someone gives you a quick death in battle one of these days, because if you ever fall into my hands, you'll find I have a long memory, and do not forgive.
{=hAbpAkIw}{STR_SALUTATION}... I think your luck has run out.
{=lbH0Fw9s}I've waited a long time for this day. Have a good look around you, for soon your eyes will have little to see but the inside of a raven's belly.
{=BXpMYumQ}Well... Forgive me if I cannot wish you 'peace,' old friend. Fate does what it will.
